title: Need help identifying distressed font
content:
OK, I apologize in advance because I know there are thousands of these “grunge” fonts out there, but if anyone recognizes this one I would really appreciate it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013212im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/plague_6566.gif)

 [‹ Il Sole 24 Ore (italian financial newspaper) title serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013212/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37780 "Go to previous forum topic") [Borealis festival poster font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013212/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37782 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze

comments.content: Well, this is based on Alternate Gothic - but it is not a custom distress, as they are the same for both A’s. mmmh.
It’s Downcome. You will find it at [misprintedtype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013212/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/).
Man, you guys just constantly amaze me. Thanks!
